vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.7.1;
son of: Carmi (H3756H)
Another spelling of a.khan (עָכָן "Achan" H5912)
§ Achar = "troubler"
1) a Judaite who violated God's specific ban on taking any loot from the captured city of Jericho and was stoned to death along with his family for this violation
1a) alternate spelling for 'Achan'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Carmí; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞干 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "惹麻煩者"
一位猶大人, 他違反神所特別交待的在處理耶利哥之役戰利品上的禁令,
因此連累其家人一同受石刑而死 #代上 2:7|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚干 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "惹麻烦者"
一位犹大人, 他违反神所特别交待的在处理耶利哥之役战利品上的禁令,
因此连累其家人一同受石刑而死 #代上 2:7|
